enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Medill Sophmores & Juniors
title: JOUR JOUR 301-0-21 Journalism in Practice

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: One of the world's most vibrant, sophisticated and troubled cities sits at our doorstep. In this class, we will examine a handful of crucial issues facing Chicago, meeting the people and exploring the neighborhoods behind the headlines and analyzing- and producing- the kind of impactful journalism that has long been part of this city's proud tradition.

subject: JOUR
